content.question: A person diving into a pool is initially rotating in a position with her legs pulled inward, as shown above in Figure 1. The person then stretches out her legs, as shown in Figure 2. Which of the following correctly describes the personâ€™s rotational inertia and angular momentum about an axis though her center of mass in the two figures?

choices.label: Rotational InertiaAngular MomentumGreater in Figure 1Greater in Figure 2
Rotational Inertia Angular MomentumGreater in Figure 2Greater in Figure 2
Rotational Inertia Angular MomentumGreater in Figure 1The same in both figures
Rotational Inertia Angular MomentumGreater in Figure 2The same in both figures

content.answer: Rotational Inertia Angular MomentumGreater in Figure 2The same in both figures
